bibl.title: Jew and Gentile in the Ancient World. Attitudes and Interactions from Alexander to Justinian.
bibl.note: Re-examines the whole picture of the relationship between Jew and Gentile in the Hellenistic and Roman world. Portions of this work have appeared in preliminary form in various publications. - P. 636: Index. Papyri.
bibl.seg: FELDMAN Louis H., Jew and Gentile in the Ancient World. Attitudes and Interactions from Alexander to Justinian.
Princeton, Princeton University Press, 1993, 8Â°, xii-679 pp. ISBN 0-691-07416-X. $59.50.

Re-examines the whole picture of the relationship between Jew and Gentile in the Hellenistic and Roman world. Portions of this work have appeared in preliminary form in various publications. - P. 636: Index. Papyri.
